message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to consider my costs and the value I've placed on the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to the value I have in mind. I'm now offering the product to you for $1050000.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your original price, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable compromise considering the value I'll get from it.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not getting close enough to my target price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my original offer. I'm now offering the product to you for $1020000.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your original price, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the value I'll get from it.
